name: Solo Wolves
description:
One worn-out man. One stray dog. Alone in the night. Two paths, two rivers diverged, until they meet, and find meaning. 

Solo Wolves is a story-driven, atmospheric 2D runner game with 6 fast-paced minigame style levels. 

Play as an office worker and as a stray dog, as they make their way through the bustling city, and have their parallel stories come together.

Coming out on October 31st, 2020!
